{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3141053,"name":"Zachary","username":"Zatack7","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/zatack7/{size}/175437_2.png","created_at":"2023-02-07T01:16:27.477Z","cooked":"

This year, for space reasons, my team may have to horizontally mount our battery. We are using a KOP chassis (AM14U5), and I’m wondering about the best way to mount the battery horizontally, as the only product to do so (in a space-efficient manner), am-2939, is discontinued, and we do not have a brake that would allow us to make something similar.
Any advice?

","post_number":1,"post_type":1,"posts_count":3,"updated_at":"2023-02-07T01:16:27.477Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":38,"reads":164,"readers_count":163,"score":222.8,"yours":false,"topic_id":425998,"topic_slug":"horizontal-battery-mounting-options-for-am14u5-2023","display_username":"Zachary","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"link_counts":[{"url":"https://www.andymark.com/products/battery-tray-for-am14u-series","internal":false,"reflection":false,"clicks":50}],"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":53819,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"ban the rev 40a breaker"},"post_url":"/t/horizontal-battery-mounting-options-for-am14u5-2023/425998/1","custom_user_title":"ban the rev 40a breaker","reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null,"can_vote":false},{"id":3141128,"name":"Elliot Scher","username":"Gandagorn","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/gandagorn/{size}/267112_2.png","created_at":"2023-02-07T03:53:12.782Z","cooked":"

Last year we made our horizontal battery mount out of the battery mounting plate that comes with the kitbot: https://www.andymark.com/products/vertical-battery-mount-bottom-plate

We arbor pressed the part that sticks up and mounted it horizontally to the back of the chassis, similar to the am-2939.

Here is the cad: Onshape
